Package ohos.agp.components

Class SearchBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.Component
      • ohos.agp.components.ComponentContainer
        • ohos.agp.components.DirectionalLayout
          • ohos.agp.components.SearchBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentParent

    public class SearchBar
extends DirectionalLayout
    Provides a user interface for the user to start a search by entering a character string and obtain the search results.

    The search results are displayed in a list. If no match is found, the result is empty. By default, the search component is an icon.

    Since:
    3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  SearchBar.FoldListener
      Provides callbacks to be invoked when the user closes the search bar.
      static interface  SearchBar.QueryListener
      Provides callbacks to be invoked when the query text is changed by the user or when the user submits the query.

      • setQuery

        public void setQuery​(String query,
                     boolean submit)
        Sets the search string and search mode. Two search modes are available: start the search immediately; or update the search string only, and later start the search by clicking the search button.
        Parameters:
        query - Indicates the search string.
        submit - true means to start a search immediately after the search string is updated; false means to update the search string only, but not to start the search immediately.
        Since:
        3

      • getQuery

        public String getQuery​()
        Obtains the search string in the search bar.
        Returns:
        Returns the search string in the search bar.
        Since:
        3

      • setSearchHint

        public void setSearchHint​(String searchHint)
        Sets the hint text to display in the search box.

        The hint text is displayed in the search box upon initialization or before any search string is provided by the user.

        Parameters:
        searchHint - Indicates the hint text to display in the search box.
        Since:
        4

      • getQueryHint

        public String getQueryHint​()
        Obtains the hint text in the search bar.
        Returns:
        Returns the hint text displayed in the search bar.
        Since:
        3

      • setIconifiedState

        public void setIconifiedState​(boolean state)
        Sets whether to iconify or expand the search bar.
        Parameters:
        state - Indicates whether to iconify or expand the search bar. true means to iconify the search bar, and false means to expand it.
        Since:

      • getIconifiedState

        public boolean getIconifiedState​()
        Obtains the current state of the search bar.
        Returns:
